SELECT ord.*, pro.name as productName, su.name as storeName, su.username as storeCode FROM `orders` ord LEFT JOIN product pro on ord.product_id = pro.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su on ord.user_id = su.id
1=1
and ord.code like concat('%', #{code}, '%')
and (su.username like concat('%', #{storeCode}, '%') or su.name like concat('%', #{storeCode}, '%'))
and ord.stone_zsbh like concat('%',#{zsBh}, '%')
and ord.create_date like concat('%', substring(#{startDate}, 1, 10), '%')
order by ${orderBy}

SELECT ord.*, pro.name as productName, pro.price as productPrice FROM `orders` ord LEFT JOIN product pro on ord.product_id = pro.id
1=1 and ord.expire_date is null
and ord.id = #{id}
and ord.code like concat('%', #{code}, '%')
limit 1
